title: kaNDEn kaN koLLA
sahitya:
kaNDEn kaN koLLA kATSi tanai kaNDEn paNDAra vEDam pUNDa pazhani yANDiyai nAn


anupallavi

  aNDangaL anaittumE adira naTanamADiya ANDavanai dEvar vENDa uditta vElanai


caraNam    paNDitarODu pAmarar koNDADip-paNivOnai daNDAyudam onrinai tAngi ninriDuvOnai
aNDinOraik-kaNDadum ANDu AtkoLvOnai eNDishaiyumE pugazh maNDit-tigazhvOnai
